rows.label: tlk00340108_msg0001
rows.name:
Glad to see that the mercs finally
acknowledge you as boss. The lot
of us are raring to go now!

rows.label: tlk00340108_msg0002
rows.name:
The more missions you complete, the
more you'll be trusted with the bigger
ones.

rows.label: tlk00340108_msg0003
rows.name:
Just remember to drop by from time
to time, yeah?
